description_for_human: Generate images and videos using Weyl's inference infrastructure. Sub-100ms latency with FLUX, Z-Image, and WAN models.
description_for_model: Weyl is an inference infrastructure API for generative media. Use this plugin to generate images from text prompts using models like FLUX.2, FLUX.1, Z-Image Turbo. Also supports video generation with WAN 2.2. The API provides sub-100ms latency for real-time applications. Key endpoints: POST /v1/sync/image for image generation, POST /v1/sync/video for video generation, GET /v1/models for available models.
